Caption: Prof. K.T. Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governors) delivers the Convocation address. On the dias, from left:  Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director), Shrimati Indira Gandhi (Prime Minister of India and Cheif Guest), Shri K.K.Sha (Governor of Tamil Nadu), Shri  C. Subramaniam (Union Minister), Prof. G.S. Laddha (Director, A.C.College of Technology).
